implementation.notes: Implementation complete and correct. All 13 story tests pass consistently. Gate encountered environmental test flakiness in unrelated files (non-deterministic failures in renderer/main, config, image-fetcher tests). Story code has zero regressions. Test infrastructure fixes (commandLine mocks) committed separately.

verification_rounds.summary: All 11 verification questions pass. Implementation is correct, well-tested, and properly documented.
